Class Application

java.lang.Object
com.webcheckers.Application
public final class Application

The entry point for the WebCheckers web application.

  • Method Details

    • isInDemoMode

      public static boolean isInDemoMode()
      Queries whether the application is being run in demo-mode.

      This method uses the memoization idiom so the calculation of this value is only done once.

      Returns:
      true if 'demoMode' property is equal to 'true'; false if the property isn't set or is not 'true'
      See Also:
      Memoization (wikipedia)

    • _isInDemoMode

      private static boolean _isInDemoMode()
      The explicit, private property lookup method.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Entry point for the WebCheckers web application.

      It wires the application components together. This is an example of Dependency Injection

      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments; none expected.

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
